form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Immigrant Visa and Alien Registration Application, Form FS-510 ( (Chinese-English)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 Form FS-510 (Chinese-English) Form Approved. 2-68 Budget, Bureau No. 47-R0150. DEPARTMENT OF STATE B h APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name Chang (Chang) % First name and middle name Ho-Lin 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) Ho Lin Chang 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman Letters not used) 4. Date of birth 5. Age 6. Place of birth Year A Month E Day 59 (Country) (Province) (City or town) 1915 Jun. 9 Rep. of China Fuchien Pu-Tien 7. Nationality 8. 188 Sex 9. Marital status () AM R * Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Chinese Male Female Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address Housewife 99-7, Tung An Street, Taipei 12. Purpose in going to the 13. United States Name and address of wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) Immigrant Chang Win-Yin, 99-7, Tung An St., Taipei 14. 15. Names and addresses of children under 21 years of age ) Person(s) named in 13 and 14 (will) (wilKaot) accompany or follow me to the United States. (Cross out words that do not apply) Nil 16. 17. Intended port of entry Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) Permanently San Francisco 18. Final address in the United States 19. Do you have a ticket to final destination? 9640 S. W. Terwilliger, Portland, Oregon 97219, USA Yes 20. 21. Person you intend to join (Give name, address and Name and address of sponsoring person or organization relationship, if any)My son Mr. Paul C. Chang (If different from 20) 9640 S. W. Terwillger, Portland, Same as 20. Oregon 97219, USA 22. Personal description 23. ## Marks of identification (a) Color of hair Height Black feet 4 * +inches None (b) Color of eyes name Complexion Brown Yellow 24. The following documents are submitted in support of this application Birth certificate Death certificate Evidence of own assets Medical record(s) Police certificate(s) Divorce decree Affidavit of support Photographs MAILE () Marriage certificate Military record Offer of employment Other (describe) THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
